oai_dc:dc.dc:title: UIMA/U-Compare Stanford Parser
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Syntactic parser for English. Outputs dependency relations. Also outputs parts-of-speech for each token.
The tool is provided as a UIMA component, specifically as Java archive (jar) file, which can be incorporated within any UIMA workflow. However, it is particularly designed use in the U-Compare text mining platform (see separate META-SHARE record), since the types of annotations it produces are compliant with the U-Compare type system.
